PERFORMANCE - Save Transaction Logs to IndexedDB


For the in-browser version:

Chrome unloads tabs when the user navigates away from them. To reduce tab-reload time save all Transaction Log entries in the database into IndexedDB. On tab-reload, first load from IndexedDB, and only then check over the network.

Save the RepositoryBlock.data into IndexedDB, instead of in the database.

To begin with (may change later): Do not save insert into the RepositoryTransactionHistory and lower entities. The data is already recorded in the RepositoryBlock.data and no analytical processing will be done in the in-browser apps.
